default.title: Report Generation
default.content: Create comprehensive reports on case progress, billing, and performance metrics. Use filters and customization options to generate exactly the information you need.
quickTips: Use date filters to focus on specific periods
Select relevant data fields for cleaner reports
Schedule regular reports for key stakeholders

case-reports.title: Case Reporting
case-reports.content: Generate detailed reports on case status, progress, and outcomes. Track case metrics and identify trends across your practice.

billing-reports.title: Billing Reports
billing-reports.content: Create time and billing reports for client invoicing and internal analysis. Track billable hours, rates, and revenue by case or attorney.

performance-analytics.title: Performance Analytics
performance-analytics.content: Analyze team performance, case efficiency, and business metrics. Use analytics to identify improvement opportunities and track goals.
